value.title: 300% Movement Speed is BONKERS! | PiG's Laboratory - StarCraft 2
value.excerpt: As part of PiG's Laboratory, I challenged StarCraft 2 pros to play with 300% movement speed while everything else remained the same. The game looks ridiculouslyT funny.
